definition: to ask a guest to stay/to detain a guest
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve

sentences.english: Obey the regulations and rules on visitors. Meeting visitors in your accommodation is allowed in the permitted time, but staying overnight is not allowed.
sentences.chinese: 遵守會客制度，在規定的時間內會客，不能留客過夜。

sentences.english: Three. Not to detain a guest accommodation and bed transferring.
sentences.chinese: 不可私自留客住宿和轉讓牀位。

definition: to decline to meet a visitor/to express one's gratitude to one's guests
to put some food aside for sb/to invite sb to stay for a meal/invitation to dinner
to have lost interest/to have had enough
to stay with sb/to ask for lodging
to put up a guest/to stay overnight
to stop for a snack while traveling
